Description: This is a NO RESERVE AUCTION FOR A GIBSON 2006 Les paul Classic. This wonderful 2006 Les Paul Classic has been "improved" ...The original pickups have been replaced with Epiphone humbuckers... (no additional holes or weirdities. Easily retrofit...)The word " Classic" has been eradicated from the peghead ..The trussrod cover that said " classic" has been replaced with a plain one.The pickguard has been replaced with one that doesn't say " 1960" .We are including two Gibson pickups that can be installed . The neck profile is wonderful; wide and flat.The finish is beautiful and the guitar plays great..except: the open D string is buzzing; the nut should be looked at...The guitar weighs 9.7 poundsComes with what I assume is the original black Gibson case, in good, functional condition. ....We charge 9.75% sales tax on all Sales made in California. Title: Gibson Les Paul Classic 2006 Gorgeous Sunburst Plays and Looks Great NO RESERVE
ConditionDescription: A genius put epiphone pickups on this beautiful 2006 Gibson Les Paul Classic. I am including a pair of appropriate Gibson pickups. Plays great, but (only) the open D string has a slight buzz ....Im assuming that the nut needs to be looked at.  Action is low; the neck profile is wide and flat; super nice. Im assuming the same genius tried to remove the word "classic" from the peghead,installed a plain truss rod cover, and a pickguard that doesn't say " 1960" .  In any case, this is a beautiful guitar.
